PHRASE.LANG: Prehistoric Valley is your regular lush mountaintop peaceful idyll… it just happens to be around 100 million years ago and inhabited by cave people, dinosaurs, and giant mammals!
La Vallée préhistorique est un site luxuriant, paisible, idyll… sauf qu'il se situe 100 millions d'années auparavant et qu'il est peuplé d'hommes des cavernes, de dinosaures et de mammifères géants !

Das prähistorische Tal ist ein ganz normales, friedliches Idyll ... außer dass es ungefähr 100 Millionen Jahre in der Vergangenheit liegt und es Höhlenmenschen, Dinosaurier und riesige Säugetiere gibt!

La Valle preistorica è il tuo idillio pacifico e lussureggiante sulla cima della montagna... è un salto nel tempo fino a circa 100 milioni di anni fa ed è abitata da cavernicoli, dinosauri e mammiferi giganti!

Valle prehistórico es tu frondoso y tranquilo paraíso en lo alto de la montaña... ¡Lo que pasa es que está a 100 millones de años atrás y poblado por cavernícolas, dinosaurios y mamíferos gigantescos!
Prehistoric Valley is your regular lush mountaintop peaceful idyll… it just happens to be around 100 million years ago and inhabited by cave people, dinosaurs, and giant mammals!
Prehistoric Valley is your regular lush mountaintop peaceful idyll… it just happens to be around 100 million years ago and inhabited by cave people, dinosaurs, and giant mammals!
